title: GSTD Platform
subtitle: Distributed Computing Network on TON
hero_subtitle: Enterprise-grade decentralized computing infrastructure on TON blockchain. Process AI inference, validation, and data tasks with cryptographic certainty.
why_gstd_desc: Built for enterprises and developers who need reliable, secure, and scalable distributed computing infrastructure.
feat_speed_desc: 5-second average task completion with intelligent load balancing across global network nodes.
feat_secure_desc: End-to-end AES-256-GCM encryption. Zero-knowledge execution. Your data never leaves your control.
feat_scale_desc: Horizontally scalable architecture. Add capacity on-demand with automatic load redistribution.
creator_1: Create tasks via Web UI, REST API, or SDK
creator_2: Pay only for completed work in TON
worker_1: Register any device as computing node
worker_2: Automatic task assignment based on capability
gstd_desc: GSTD (Guaranteed Service Time Depth) is a utility token for platform operations. Fully compliant with MiCA (EU) and SEC (US) requirements. Backed by XAUt gold through the GSTD/XAUt liquidity pool.
docs_subtitle: Everything you need to integrate with GSTD Platform
